name: cerb.ticket.status
description: An interaction for quickly changing ticket status
script:
inputs:
  record/ticket:
    required@bool: yes
    record_type: ticket
  text/status:
    type: freeform
    required@bool: yes
  text/confirm:
    type: bool
    default: no

start:
  decision/validate:
    outcome/noPerm:
      if@bool: {{not cerb_record_writeable('ticket',inputs.ticket.id,'worker',worker_id)}}
      then:
        return:
    outcome/invalidStatus:
      if@bool: {{inputs.status not in ['open','closed','waiting','deleted']}}
      then:
        log.error: `inputs.status` ({{inputs.status}}) must be one of: open, closed, waiting, deleted
        return:

  # Do we need a confirmation?
  outcome/confirm:
    if@bool: {{inputs.confirm}}
    then:
      await:
        form:
          title: Confirm
          elements:
            say/confirm:
              content@text:
                ### Are you sure you want to change this ticket status from **{{inputs.ticket.status}}** to **{{inputs.status}}**?
            submit/prompt_confirm:
              buttons:
                continue/yes:
                  label: Continue
                  icon: circle-ok
                  icon_at: start
                  value: yes
                continue/no:
                  label: Cancel
                  icon: circle-remove
                  icon_at: start
                  value:  no
                  style: secondary
      outcome/cancel:
        if@bool: {{prompt_confirm != 'yes'}}
        then:
          return:
  
  record.update/ticket:
    output: updated_ticket
    inputs:
      record_type: ticket
      record_id: {{inputs.ticket.id}}
      fields:
        status: {{inputs.status}}
policy_kata:
commands:
  record.update:
    deny/type@bool: {{inputs.record_type is not record type ('ticket')}}
    allow@bool: yes
